name: It Never Ends (itch) (HaoLiao)
description:
【Notes】

This game saves automatically. When you play, make sure:

1. You don't close the game when the dialog is still playing.

2. You are not playing this game in incognito mode.

3. You don't clear the cache before you finish.

4. You can press R if you want to clear the saving and reset the whole game.

Otherwise, feel free to close this game at any time, since it will never end.

【Special Thanks】

Bianbi
Joey Schutz
 
【Visual】

Most of the art is made by Bianbi in 30 minutes. Also thank her for discussing the narrative with me.

【Sounds】

"8 Bit Game Intro Loop" by Mrthenoronha

【Fonts】

"KB Cloudy Day" by Khrys Bosland
